data.message: Your fans are the reason you have the career and success that you do. You just shit on them. You are entitled to your political opinions, just as they are. Yet you just told them that their opinions and voices don’t count. People like you are the problem. You spread and motivate hate. Hope your “message” was all worth it to you.

replies.message: He don't care he don't want Yall support duh
Never had mine to begin with.
Haters gonna hate. Whatever helps you sleep at night.
Hilary Propeck I love how female trump supporters refuse to acknowledge the grab by the pussy line.

My post above is directed at what he said to / about his fans. I don’t give a shit what his feelings are on Trump. He’s entitled to his opinion. Nor do I have any interest in discussing the good, bad, or the ugly of Trump.

I guess you never heard of groupies and gold digger begging to get their pussy grabbed by.....Beatles, Elvis...or Trump. Those billions of dollars attract women who hope to have their pussy grabbed. Grow up.
Suzie Schneider Trump wasn't talking about Gold Diggers.
Hilary Propeck And what he said about his fans was if you support trump F you.. lol. It all connects. It's not like it's a separate thing.

No it fucking doesn’t. You don’t hate on someone simply because they have a different opinion than you do-political or not. Especially when it’s those who are the backbone to your success. Don’t sit here and keep trying to justify what he said. Because there isn’t a fucking thing that you can say to me that’s gonna change my mind on how I feel. Go waste your time elsewhere with that BS.
